Music Technology

Select Works

Brevity

A visual installation of a family holiday in Sydney and Perth, Australia. Images manipulated using Max/Jitter. Sound manipulation through PyPadberg system and Max/MSP.
You can view the published paper on the PyPadberg system that I presented at NIME, Brazil, in 2019. here.


Squeek, Sqwak, Click

MFA in Integrated Composition, Improvisation and Technology, Creative Practices Showcase, Semester 2
Performed at the MoCap Studio, University of California, Irvine.

Little One

MFA in Integrated Composition, Improvisation and Technology, Creative Practices Showcase, Semester 3
Performed at the MoCap Studio, University of California, Irvine.

Fragments of a heartbeat

MFA in Integrated Composition, Improvisation and Technology, Capstone Recital
